title: Grid Tracks
summary: A grid track is the space between two adjacent grid lines. They are defined in the explicit grid by using the grid-template-columns and grid-template-rows properties or the shorthand grid or grid-template properties. Tracks are also created in the implicit grid by positioning a grid item outside of the tracks created in the explicit grid.
